name: Cooking Dash 3: Thrills & Spills
summary:
Prepare for a stroll down memory lane with Cooking Dash 3: Thrills & Spills. Meet Flo and the rest of the DinerToons as youthful DinerTeens, working their first summer job at Mr. Big's theme park restaurants. Mr. Big's having trouble turning a profit; so help him turn his disaster into a smashing success! Can you keep Flo and her friends preppin', grillin' and sizzlin'? Find out in this thrilling time-management game where you'll serve sit-down customers, bag up food for Dash-Thru window diners, and revamp every restaurant in the park.

• 50 fast-paced levels of play
• Fun themed venues like the Log Jam, Spooky Shack, and Deep Dive!
• New Dash-Thru window service to keep you on your toes
• Nostalgic DinerTeen flashbacks + 9 customer personality types
• Win prepped food to use in the levels by winning 4 different mini-games
